# Battle of Khed

| result            = Shahu's  victory
| combatant1        =  Forces of Shahu I
| combatant2        =  Forces of Tarabai
| commander1        = Shahu IParsoji BhonsleMalharraje KordeChimnaji Damodar
| commander2        = Dhanaji JadhavParshuram Pant PratinidhiBalaji Vishwanath

| causalities2      =
| conflict          = Battle of Khed
}}
The Battle of Khed took place on 12 October 1707, between Shahu I and the forces of Tarabai led by Dhanaji Jadhav. The battle occurred at Khed, situated near the Bhima river to the north of Pune.
